newsitem.title: UK: Zeneca storms ahead on bumper profits news.
newsitem.headline: Zeneca storms ahead on bumper profits news.

text.p: Shares in Zeneca Group Plc rose 20p to 1,892-1/2p after the company revealed pre-tax profits growth of 15 percent in the first four months of the year at constant exchange rates, analysts said.
"There's reassurance there with underlying profits up 15 percent against a strong first half last year and they've said new products are looking good," said one analyst.
"That 15 percent is amongst the best in the industry," he said.
Analysts said profit forecasts for the year would now likely rise to the top end of the range at 1.1 billion stg.
Zeneca edged up 10p to 1,884p immediately after the news from the annual general meeting.
Every 10p on the Zeneca share price represents 0.55 points on the FTSE 100 index.
